Articles.Content:
Behold, another one of my numerous gaming threads! This one is about TF2. I just joined the Playerbase , and am currently learning. Anyone else play?

Edited February 3, 2014 by Rainbowtrout
I thought about starting to play that game but i guess it is kinda hard to get into.

My son plays it. If you think this is hard to get into, ask yourself: how did you get into KSP???

About joining the "fanbase"... nice. So, now you are a ventilator??

Just play the thing, don't become the ventilator.

FAN=
I was really into TF2 around 2009-2011. Haven't played it much recently but I still do take it for a spin from time to time.
I've tried it. But I don't like it.

are you now a ventilator??

Happy now? Besides, if I was any house appliance, I'd be a toaster.
Been playing since 2007 and still playing it on evenings on my fav server but it has to be said if it was not for that server and its community i would have uninstalled the game a long time ago.

I played TF2 at ~2011, but currently my interest slowly fall off to the point that I'm bored of it for no reason at all, replaced with Dota 2.

I'm usually plays 32 player 2fort server or MvM server, still trying to beat the wave 666

I love playing spy on 2fort. You know, scare the snipers so they're busy watching for me instead of heatshooting my buddies. Plus, it's hilarius as **** when I (cloaked with the C&D) Disguise as different classes and start screaming "Help!" right behind them.

That game never gets old.

Its a totally different FPS, It has an insane attention to balance.

Once you get past the initial phase and start learning maps and learning what classes can do, It gets really fun.

Its even better if you get a group of people and have a regular server, you can even do some MVM.

And because nobody has said it yet. Hats.

Happy now? Besides, if I was any house appliance, I'd be a toaster.

No, not happy. I would actually like you to be a toaster. I myself am more inclined to be an electric kettle myself, should I have got the chance. Ah well, can't have all... I'll stay the little black bicycle I am : (
I joined this year(or at the very end of last year) but I don't play it regularly.
I started around 2012 if my memory serves right, played it a couple of months, and am now getting back into it again.

I have played some 10 hours since I downloaded it, and I also bought premium, because my friends persuaded me to join their clan. But I don't play it on regular basis, especially now, when studying is my first priority.
